Package render

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
render.Camera
public class Camera extends Object
This is the camera class, this class creates a single instance of the camera, handles inputs, and according to the inputs moves or rotates the camera.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Vector3f
    yAxis
    This is a parameter that is used to specify the Y axis
